snippet.title: The best gourmet pizzas in Wollongong - as voted by you
snippet.content:

10. Sam's Pizza Restaurant, 1/21 George Street, Warilla
10. Sam's Pizza Restaurant, 1/21 George Street, Warilla
9. Crust Gourmet Pizza Bar, Shellharbour, Wollongong and Thirroul
9. Crust Gourmet Pizza Bar, Shellharbour, Wollongong and Thirroul
8. Il Nido Trattoria Pizzeria, 1/154 Balgownie Road, Balgownie
8. Il Nido Trattoria Pizzeria, 1/154 Balgownie Road, Balgownie
7. Kneading Ruby, 5 Crown Lane, Wollongong
7. Kneading Ruby, 5 Crown Lane, Wollongong
6. Woonona Pizza Kitchen, 20-22 Ball Street, Woonona

Equal 4th. Figtree Gourmet Kitchen, 101 Bellevue Road, Figtree

Equal 4th. Lupa Woodfired Pizza, 98-100 Keira Street, Wollongong
Equal 4th. Lupa Woodfired Pizza, 98-100 Keira Street, Wollongong
3. Northbeach Pavilion Pizza Restaurant, Bar & Kiosk, 5 Cliff Road, Wollongong
3. Northbeach Pavilion Pizza Restaurant, Bar & Kiosk, 5 Cliff Road, Wollongong
2. Da Orlando Woodfire Pizzeria, 348 Keira Street, Wollongong
2. Da Orlando Woodfire Pizzeria, 348 Keira Street, Wollongong
1. Napoli Pizza + Pasta Restaurant, 66 Burelli Street, Wollongong
1. Napoli Pizza + Pasta Restaurant, 66 Burelli Street, Wollongong
exit FLIP THROUGH THE GALLERY ABOVE for a look at the best places to go for gourmet pizza in the Illawarra - as voted by you. We received over 1200 nominations for more than 20 different pizzarias. After whittling down the votes, we have your top 10.
Did your favourite make it to the list? You might also like ...
